mapper.select: select id, electricity_cabinet_id, cell_no, type, status, upgrade_version, create_time, update_time from t_ele_new_ota_upgrade where id = #{id}
select id, electricity_cabinet_id, cell_no, type, status, upgrade_version, create_time, update_time from t_ele_new_ota_upgrade limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into t_ele_new_ota_upgrade(electricity_cabinet_id, cell_no, type, status, upgrade_version, create_time, update_time) values (#{electricityCabinetId}, #{cellNo}, #{type}, #{status}, #{upgradeVersion}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update t_ele_new_ota_upgrade
electricity_cabinet_id = #{electricityCabinetId},
cell_no = #{cellNo},
type = #{type},
status = #{status},
upgrade_version = #{upgradeVersion},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
